entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump This immigration ban has nothing to do with coronavirus or jobs. People who are applying for green card have already been working and living in US for years. This EO helps no one and only harms hard working people who have already spent years waiting for green card
